overview: Donald Hampton (Kenneth Harlan), a rich playboy, falls in love with an actress, Fay Leslie (Helene Chadwick), and marries her against the wishes of his mother Mrs. Hampton (Frances Raymond). Later, when Donald finds another man, Keith Carlin (John Patrick) in Fay's boudoir, he goes to pieces, believing that his marriage, like stage kisses, is phony. Faithful Fay then sets out to show her husband that she has been the victim of a set-up by her mother-in-law.
title: Stage Kisses
